entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
